name: NekoXNezumi
description:
In NekoXNezumi you play as a shape-shifter walking through an 80s anime themed city at night. You can either shift into a cat or a mouse, with the cat being able to jump and the mouse being able to crawl into small spaces. Be careful though, other cats are out to get you!

 

The game was inspired by the theme of superpowers, where we chose shapeshifting as our power. We believe that everyone has their own superpower and something that they're good at. Remember, there are no wrong choices in this game ùwú
